item.title: Network Plus Course: Importance of Documentation and Policies in Network Management
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity

item.description: Explore the significance of organizational documents and policies, common types of documentation, baseline configurations, and agreements in network management for CompTIA's Network+ Certification Exam.
